thread.title: Justin Trudeau comparisons with Hugh Grant in Love Actually go viral
thread.title_full: Justin Trudeau comparisons with Hugh Grant in Love Actually go viral

author: Mark Molloy
title: Justin Trudeau comparisons with Hugh Grant in Love Actually go viral
text:
T he internet’s love for Justin Trudeau has increased since his handshake with Donald Trump and the latest meme doing the rounds is the Canadian prime minister being compared to Hugh Grant in Love Actually.
Grant plays newly elected prime minister ‘David’ in the 2003 rom-com in which he stands up to the US president (played by Billy Bob Thornton) in one scene.
Watch | Trudeau meets Trump at the White House 00:41 Various photos have been shared on social media comparing Trudeau to Grant’s character in the film: Am I the only one getting a "Love Actually" vibe? #Trudeau pic.twitter.com/NmqDdn9i2Q 
— Lizz Cone (@lizzcone) February 13, 2017 Justin Trudeau es Hugh Grant en “Love Actually” y Trump no puede superar eso https://t.co/uwjLwvTCAX pic.twitter.com/RhkkqjwpNi 
— María Martínez (@Marimarttinezz) February 15, 2017 Too real.
Taking comfort in imaging Trudeau reenacting Hugh Grant's dancing scene. pic.twitter.com/EaF55oiLIw 
— Sally Holmes (@sallyholmes) February 13, 2017 The Prime Minister in Love Actually (2003) looks A LOT like Justin Trudeau. pic.twitter.com/JRtvvYuu1J 
— Devin Scully (@ScullyDevin) January 12, 2017 Last night's dream: Hanging out W/Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. Tho sometimes it was Hugh Grant (in Love Actually). pic.twitter.com/lq2FakvDmk 
— Jessica Anya Blau (@JessicaAnyaBlau) July 13, 2016 T rudeau's handshake with Trump was jokingly described as the “biggest display of dominance in the history of Canada” on social media .



It predictably sparked a host of memes: *record scratch* 
*freeze frame* 
TRUDEAU: yup, that's me, you'e pro- 
TRUMP: personally I dont feel they're that small #TrudeauMeetsTrump pic.twitter.com/jXOFm5Jbiz 
— Andy Cole (@AndyCole84) February 13, 2017 Trump: "Put 'er there Justin."
Trudeau: "I'd prefer not to."
Trump: "C'mon..."
Trudeau: "Shinzo told me it'd be a bad idea." #TrudeauTrump pic.twitter.com/JznGbaWdh4 
— Drew Gibson (@SuppressThis) February 13, 2017 His meeting with a ‘swooning’ Ivanka Trump was also a talking point on social media: Relationship goals: find a woman who looks at you the way Ivanka Trump looks at Justin Trudeau. pic.twitter.com/HphcU7svmw 
— Ian Miles Cheong (@stillgray) February 13, 2017 Lma Ivanka Trump looking at Justin Trudeau is me like yup, me too gurl. Me too. pic.twitter.com/uBp7pvxIm8 
— natalie (@nataliegithu) February 14, 2017 A fter their meeting, Trudeau said he "wouldn’t lecture" Trump over his controversial travel ban.
"There have been times where we have differed in our approaches and that's always been done firmly and respectfully," he said.
"The last thing Canadians expect is for me to come down and lecture another country on how they choose to govern themselves."
How the Trump-Trudeau awkward handshake sparked a host of memes . 
Profile | Justin Trudeau
